ATTACHMENT ID: 12937297 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

[~ashutoshc], who is managing the automatic builds and tests that generated the entry above (author: Hive QA)? I see two issues here:

1. According to the first comment the build wasn't successful (see -1	mvninstall	0m 20s	svr in the patch failed.), but according to the second comment everything went fine. Hive indeed can be built with this patch, so it's not clear why they couldn't build it.

2. It seems that the findbugs (and I assume that also the other quality checks) are running for the generated codes as well, which should not happen. It should exclude target/generated-sources/*
